name: Pizza
description: A delicious flatbread topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and various toppings, baked to perfection.

name: Salad
description: A healthy mix of fresh vegetables, often dressed with olive oil, vinegar, or your choice of dressing.

name: Sweet Potato
description: A naturally sweet and nutritious root vegetable, rich in vitamins and fiber.

name: Gnocchi
description: Soft and pillowy dumplings made from potatoes, flour, and eggs, typically served with a savory sauce.

name: Pot Roast
description: A tender and flavorful beef roast cooked slowly with vegetables and seasonings.

name: Lasagna
description: A classic Italian dish made with layers of pasta, cheese, and rich meat or vegetable sauce.

name: Hamburger
description: A juicy beef patty served in a bun with various toppings like lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

name: Pad Thai
description: A popular Thai noodle dish stir-fried with eggs, tofu, shrimp, and a tangy tamarind sauce.

name: Almonds
description: A handful of crunchy and nutritious nuts, rich in healthy fats and protein.

name: Sarma
description: Traditional rolled grape leaves filled with a savory mix of rice, meat, and spices.

name: Bacon
description: Crispy strips of cured pork, perfect as a savory addition to any meal.

name: Hot Dog
description: A grilled or steamed sausage served in a sliced bun, often topped with condiments like mustard or ketchup.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: A rich and moist cake made with cocoa and topped with a luscious chocolate frosting.

name: Wheat Bread
description: A hearty loaf of bread made from whole wheat flour, perfect for sandwiches or toast.

name: Orange
description: A juicy and refreshing citrus fruit, rich in vitamin C and natural sweetness.

name: Banana
description: A soft and sweet tropical fruit, an excellent source of potassium and energy.

name: Yogurt
description: A creamy and tangy dairy product, often enjoyed plain or with fruits and honey.
